summary: Completed comprehensive testing of candle e-commerce website. Backend APIs working well (24/26 tests passed), frontend UI functional with successful authentication, shopping flow, cart management, and admin dashboard. UPI payment simulation working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just HTTP status code difference

ui_bugs.issue: Search functionality not found in header navigation
ui_bugs.selector: Search input not present in header

integration_issues.issue: Minor DOM element detachment during checkout flow

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (user and admin login)
User dashboard with order history and profile
Admin dashboard with stats, product management, order management, user management
Protected routes and role-based access control
Homepage hero section, categories, featured products
Shop page with filtering by category and sorting
Product detail pages with image gallery and add to cart
Guest cart functionality with localStorage persistence
UPI payment simulation with 90% success rate
action_item_for_main_agent: Add search functionality to header navigation. The search feature is mentioned in requirements but not implemented in the header. All other core e-commerce features are working correctly.
